programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.
MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die, 19931030000000 +0000, New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

programme.title: The Brute Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brute Man, S07E02, Rondo Hatton plays a disfigured man, a/k/a “The Creeper,” who hunts down and kills the people responsible for his deformity.

programme.title: What About Juvenile Delinquency?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E07, A band of no-good punks beat a guy for driving too slow and steal his mechanical pencil, before arriving to pick up their missing member Jamie, the son of the man they've just beaten.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: The Corpse Vanishes
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes, S01E05, In the theater, Joel and the Bots get the third installment of "Radar Men from the Moon" before the Bela Lugosi film "The Corpse Vanishes".

Side Hackers, 19900928000000 +0000, A motorcycle racer and a violent stunt rider start a war of vengeance against each other. Joel and the Bots write a song inspired by the movie and chat with a few characters from the film on the Hexfield.

programme.title: The Violent Years
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Violent Years, S06E10, Jam Handy shows the world the glory of sexism with electric kitchen appliances and Ed Wood analyzes the world of criminals spoiled by their parents.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E22, It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.

MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats, 19950121000000 +0000, After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast. Can desert patrolmen Jim Archer and Joe Dobson stop the creature before it kills again?

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Young Man's Fancy
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E24, A story sponsored by the Edison Electric Institute that encourages use of a number of home appliances.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K: Outlaw Of Gor Interview
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E31, Watch some in-depth interviews and get an inside look at the movie itself that is classically riffed in this Mystery Science Theater 3000 episode.

programme.title: The Rebel Set
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Rebel Set, S04E19, Three coffee shop customers help an owner rob an armored car.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Sport Parade: Snow Thrills
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E13, A classic newsreel that highlights various winter sports.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 3: Crashing Towers
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E12, The final chapter of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abby sends her girls off to their first day at a new school.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.
Pack of Lies, 19870426000000 +0000, A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.

Pictures of Hollis Woods, 20071202000000 +0000, Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

The Magic of Ordinary Days, 20050130000000 +0000, Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.
Stargate, 19941028000000 +0000, When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

Stargate Origins: Catherine, 20180619000000 +0000, 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

Stargate: Continuum, 20080729000000 +0000, In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

Stargate: The Ark of Truth, 20080101080000 +0000, When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E09, Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E18, The team searches the ocean for a mobile geothermal drilling station the ancients left dormant. Cautiously exploring the station, Teyla thinks she senses the presence of a Wraith. Weir, believing it's pressure affecting Teyla, has the team press on.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E19, After helping relocate the Taranans, the Atlantis team realizes they haven't heard from the village in a long period of time. It appears the Taranans have just abandoned their village until McKay detects life signs well beneath the surface.

programme.title: First Strike
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E20, The team is shocked when a satellite housing a stargate takes up orbit above Atlantis. When the stargate begins transmitting an energy beam, attacking the city, McKay takes a page from the Ancients and opts to sink Atlantis back into the ocean.

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E01, When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the city’s shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E02, Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppard’s team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E03, Ronon reconnects with a group of Satedans from his past who enlist the Atlantis team's help on a dangerous mission against the Wraith. But after the Atlantis crew is captured, Ronon is faced with the truth about his old friends’ new loyalties.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E04, During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E10, Erica is arrested for prostitution and released into Kelly and Brandon's custody. Jodi claims that Steve is the only man who could have possibly fathered her child. Mel helps David file for bankruptcy and pay back Donna.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E11, Brandon is arrested for obstructing justice. David moves into the office at the After Dark and accidentally starts a fire. Valerie visits Sands and learns that Noah paid off David's debt.

programme.title: Friends In Deed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E12, Dr. Monahan's behavior unnerves Kelly as he checks out her injured shoulder. Valerie warns Noah that he may be in over his head trying to manage the After Dark.

programme.title: Comic Relief
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E13, Dr. Monahan makes inappropriate advances toward Kelly. David and Valerie proceed with their plan to make their exes jealous. Steve performs at the After Dark's comedy showcase.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.

programme.title: Illegal Tender
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E16, David tries to make amends after his first music review gets the artist fired; Valerie ignores Noah's decree to halt the sports betting at the club.

programme.title: Washer Baby/Infrared
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E280, An 18-month old accidentally falls into a washing machine. A neighbor calls 911 to report a break-in at the house next door.

programme.title: Seattle Cop, Part 2/Digitalis Kid OD
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E240, Continuation of "A 22-year veteran officer shot in the chest during a routine traffic stop". A 2-year-old swallowed her grandmother's heart medicine.

programme.title: Fire Ant/Spiderman Rescue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E123, 26-month-old baby falls into a swarm of fire ants/Woman trapped on the ledge of apartment building 20 ft. up.

programme.title: Car Surfing Girl/Wrong Number
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E356, A 10-year old girl is riding on a car's hood when she's thrown off when the car stops. A 10-year old girl accidentally calls the wrong number and discovers a man who may be dying.

programme.title: Chance Encounter/Baby Bathtub Burn
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E372, Rescuers search for a missing hiker in a treacherous canyon. A baby is burned when his sister tries to give him a bath.

programme.title: Venezuela Cave, Part 2/Swiss Army Knife
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E257, Continuation of a diver lost in an underwater cave. A man on a plane chokes on a piece of meat.

programme.title: Sinking Sisters/Subway Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E102, A mother leaves babies strapped in a car that accidentally rolls into water. An unconscious man is laying on subway tracks.

programme.title: Heart Attack/Runaway Box Cars
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E189, A woman notices the driver in front of her slump over his wheel. Two railroad boxcars get loose on tracks.

programme.title: Miami Medchopper/River Raft
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E237, A restaurant owner and customer were shot by an assailant. A young man is caught in a powerful undertow and needs to be rescued.

programme.title: Barracuda Barrage/ATV Flip
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E338, A woman is injured when a 6-foot barracuda jumps into their boat. An 11-year-old boy is injured when the all-terrain vehicle he's riding flips over.

programme.title: Oakland Docu/Running Senior
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E192, Rescue 911 rides along with Mobile Crisis Team in Oakland California. A 70 year old suffers cardiac arrest after the 1600 meter race.

programme.title: Peanut Heimlich/Piggy Peril
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E302, Parents call 911 when their toddler begins to choke. A woman calls 911 when she sees flames at the house next door.

programme.title: Suicide/Highway Hero
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E184, A telemarketer connects to an answering machine with a message that sounds like a suicide threat. Rescue 911 rides with officers of Baltimore's quick response team.

programme.title: The Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E12, Craig gets jealous when Mitch reunites with his and Craig’s old flame. Meanwhile, Eddie buys a classic Mustang for cheap, only to get arrested for possession of a stolen car.

programme.title: Armored Car
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E13, Jill teams up with Trevor to win a beach volleyball tournament, but all she really wants is to beat her former lover's team. Eddie and Shauni team up to rescue a young girl trapped in an armored car that topples off the pier into the ocean.

programme.title: Home Cort
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E14, Mitch gets a surprise visit from his old, mischievous Navy S.E.A.L. buddy and ex-Baywatch lifeguard, John Cort, adding serious problems in their already complicated relationship. And Shauni and Jill fight a battle of the sexes against a shady vendor.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.

programme.title: Muddy Waters
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E16, Cort and Eddie train lifeguards at a water park, but someone is vandalizing the waterslides, putting people's lives in danger. Meanwhile, Captain Thorpe wants Shauni fired for posing in a provocative calendar.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E17, Eddie and Cort happen upon an illegal gambling ship. Meanwhile, Mitch begins to spend more time with Hobie's English teacher – a liaison that embarrasses Hobie beyond belief.

programme.title: Eclipse
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E18, After losing his rookie partner in the mysterious rescue of what he thinks is a ghost, Eddie gets unwittingly caught up in a 70-year-old legend. Meanwhile, Hobie attempts to help a friend find a new home for her dog.

programme.title: Shark Derby
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E19, A local restaurateur puts up a $25,000 bounty for the largest shark caught during the weekend's Shark Derby he's sponsoring. To attract more sharks, he illegally chums the waters, drawing hundreds of sharks uncommonly close to shore.

programme.title: The Big Race
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E20, Cort promises to come up with $10,000 for a nursing home, but he needs Mitch and Craig's help to compete in a water-skiing race with a big cash prize. Shauni’s traumatic fear of the ocean after Jill’s death threatens her future with Baywatch.

programme.title: Old Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E21, Craig, Mitch, and Garner go for a weekend hang-gliding trip, but Mitch has a serious accident, and ends up facing death before the fangs of a rattlesnake! Cort reacquaints himself with a woman who has a shocking secret.

programme.title: The End?
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E22, A massive earthquake destroys Baywatch headquarters and leaves Gina's life hanging in the balance. Meanwhile, Cort and Craig are trapped in the ocean. And Eddie is the only one left who can help a pregnant woman going into labor.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E01, Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E02, When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the “Creature in the Bay” is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E03, After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence – unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Money, Honey
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E04, After Mitch makes a heroic ocean rescue while working at her private beach party, a Hollywood producer offers Mitch the starring role in a movie. Meanwhile, Harvey and Shauni hold a wild bikini contest to raise money for an aquatic rescue group.

programme.title: The Fabulous Buchannon Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E05, Mitch receives an unexpected visit from his free-spirited brother, whose troubled son entices Hobie to surf the pylons of a treacherous condemned pier. Meanwhile, a local vendor nearly causes a riot when his bikinis disintegrate in the water.

programme.title: Point of Attack
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E06, After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.
